adaptation.name: Multilingual Resonance Tags
adaptation.description: Resonance tags can include terms in multiple languages for cross-lingual threading
adaptation.schema_extension: <resonance_tags> <tag lang="en">machine learning</tag> <tag lang="zh">机器学习</tag> <tag lang="es">aprendizaje automático</tag> </resonance_tags>

adaptation.name: Cross-Language Semantic Threading
adaptation.description: Xylem layer should thread artifacts across language boundaries using multilingual embeddings
adaptation.benefit: Discover connections between English and Chinese research, for example

adaptation.name: Translation Artifact Lineage
adaptation.description: Translated artifacts should reference source language and original artifact
adaptation.example: Translation of technical doc from Chinese to English maintains lineage to source

adaptation.name: Cultural Context Preservation
adaptation.description: Voice_to_the_Future can include cultural context notes for cross-cultural analysis
adaptation.use_case: Chinese regulatory context, regional business practices, localization insights

use_case.name: Cross-Language Analysis
use_case.description: Compare concepts across languages, translation, multilingual research

use_case.name: International Research
use_case.description: Synthesize research from multiple language sources

use_case.name: Localization & Cultural Analysis
use_case.description: Product localization, cultural adaptation, regional insights

use_case.name: General Reasoning
use_case.description: Balanced reasoning across domains with tool integration

transmission_flags.flag: MULTILINGUAL - Artifact contains or references multiple languages
CULTURAL_CONTEXT - Includes cultural or regional context
TOOL_INTEGRATED - Used external tools or APIs

protocol_notes.note: Qwen's multilingual capabilities enable unique cross-language semantic threading. Resonance tags in multiple languages help discover non-obvious connections.
When translating artifacts, preserve lineage to source language version to enable verification and future re-translation if source changes.
Cultural context in Voice_to_the_Future is valuable for international projects. Don't strip regional nuances in pursuit of neutrality.
